author: Richard Rubin
title: Congress Reaches Deal to Fix Tax Overhaul’s ’Grain Glitch’
text:
WASHINGTON—U.S. lawmakers reached a last-minute deal to reverse an error in December’s tax law that was helping farm cooperatives and hurting their corporate competitors.
The agreement to alter the so-called grain glitch is expected to be attached to a must-pass spending bill slated to become law later this week, said a person familiar with the discussions. Final details haven’t been released.

Democrats,...
